document.full_text: a jailed former russian oil tycoon kept up his fight against the kremlin on monday, filing for parole following last week's court decision to keep him in jail for 13 years.
document.title: russian ex-tycoon khodorkovsky files for parole
lines_and_colors: a jailed former russian oil tycoon kept up his fight against the kremlin on monday, filing for parole following last week's court decision to keep him in jail for 13 years.
